title: Before Midnight
description: A successful business woman and mother of three is found shot in her office. She was the center of her kids' universe, dedicated to her financial planning firm and had recently gotten engaged. The investigation into her death leaves a family divided as they question if justice will be served. Keith Morrison reports.
author: nbcnews.podcasts@gmail.com (NBC News)
